fn.p: Funding. This research was funded by grants from the U.S. Department of Homeland Security under Grant Award No. DHS-2010-ST-061-AG0001 for the Center of Excellence for Emerging and Zoonotic Animal Diseases, National Pork Board grant #16-021, #16-022 and #16-184, and the State of Kansas National Bio- and Agro-Defense Facility transition funds. WCW is supported by US Department of Agriculture.
